InstructionData.Title: Memory test
InstructionData.Description: testing if IC has persistent registersâ€‹
InstructionData.Author: Kdandikk
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias mem1 r14 alias input d0
s db Setting 1 l r0 input Setting yield
s db Setting r0
ble r0 0 display save: move mem1 r0 display:
s db Setting mem1
